newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia inflation quickens to 0.4 pct in short week.
newsitem.headline: Russia inflation quickens to 0.4 pct in short week.

text.p: Russian inflation is estimated to have accelerated in the week ended March 7 to 0.4 percent from 0.3 percent in the previous week, the State Statistics Committee said on Thursday.
The latest week actually covered only four days, less than usual, because of the Women's Day holiday marked on March 10.
Prices have risen 4.3 percent so far this year. Monthly inflation in February was 1.5 percent.
The committee issued the following estimates:
Percentage change in week ended March 7 March 3
Basket of 37 basic goods and services +0.2 0.5
Basket of 37 basic goods and services +0.093 +1.116
The committee does not formally collate weekly inflation data, but estimates the weekly trend on the basis of the prices of 37 basic goods and services.
